title: Ep 94: crack sommelier
itunes:author: Desus Nice & THE KID MERO
itunes:summary:
The brand is strong! The Bronx's very own Desus Nice & THE KID MERO aka the Bodega Boys (from Desus & Mero on Viceland) are giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Special episode recorded at Promedia studio in NYC

This week: helicopters, Trump gonna get us kilt, it's cold as hell, dominican black mirror and more!
